sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Typography, Box, Paper, List, ListItem, ListItemText, Link } from '@mui/material';

function SearchResult({ result }) {
  return (
    <Box sx={{ display: 'flex' }}>
      <Box sx={{ flex: 2, pr: 2 }}>
        <Typography variant="body1" paragraph>
          {result.answer}
        </Typography>
        <Box sx={{ mt: 4 }}>
          <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
            1. 유사도 점수의 기준을 설정
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
            2. ##점을 넘어가는 논문: 유사도가 높은 순으로 정렬, N개만 노출
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
            3. ##점을 넘어가는 논문이 없다면: 답변이 없는 빈페이지 노출
          </Typography>
        </Box>
      </Box>
      <Box sx={{ flex: 1 }}>
        <Paper elevation={3} sx={{ p: 2 }}>
          <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>논문 출처</Typography>
          <List>
            {result.sources.map((paper, index) => (
              <ListItem key={index} alignItems="flex-start" sx={{ px: 0 }}>
                <ListItemText
                  primary={
                    <Typography variant="subtitle2" color="primary">
                      {index + 1}. {paper.title}
                    </Typography>
                  }
                  secondary={
                    <>
                      <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                        {paper.authors}
                      </Typography>
                      <Link href={paper.url} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" color="primary" variant="body2">
                        논문 전문
                      </Link>
                      <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                        초록 내용
                      </Typography>
                      <Typography variant="body2">
                        저자명, 저널명
                      </Typography>
                    </>
                  }
                />
              </ListItem>
            ))}
          </List>
        </Paper>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
}

export default SearchResult;
